statements: SELECT * FROM UserInteractionData WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT item_id, rating FROM UserInteractionData WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, item_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractionData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, timestamp FROM UserInteractionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM UserInteractionData WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractionData WHERE item_id = '5cc65e37-926d-4d3f-b726-7d8c35a96c4a';
SELECT user_id, item_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractionData WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM UserInteractionData WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractionData GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM interactions WHERE rating > 3.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(item_id) FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(item_id) > 5;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, occupation FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT u.user_id, u.age, i.item_id FROM users u INNER JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE u.age > 25 AND i.rating >= 4.0;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(item_id) AS num_items FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_items > 5 ORDER BY num_items DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM users GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_age DESC;
SELECT gender, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM users u INNER JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, item_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123';
SELECT item_name, category FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category FROM items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '089265be-8269-49c9-b16d-9d9fc1de7f52';
SELECT item_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '72c8a52d-9299-4af0-a0bb-768ee09d0545' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, item_name FROM users INNER JOIN items ON users.user_id = items.item_id WHERE users.user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM items INNER JOIN user_interactions ON items.item_id = user_interactions.item_id GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT MAX(age) FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT item_id, description FROM Items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interactions_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT item_id, category FROM Items WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT log_id, user_id, item_id FROM RecommenderLogs WHERE action = 'click' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, age FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM Items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM Ratings WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, similarity_score FROM SimilarityScores;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM Items WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM Ratings WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id1, user_id2, similarity_score FROM SimilarityScores WHERE user_id1 < user_id2;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM Recommendations WHERE rating >= 3 AND user_id = 1001 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
